quote-source: David M. Perry, No, Carly Fiorina, a degree in medieval history doesn’t qualify you to fight Isis, The Guardian, October 6, 2015.
quote-text: If Carly Fiorina really wants to draw on the Middle Ages for inspiration, I do have some suggestions. Lesson one: support universities, scholars, writers and artists, as their contributions outlive us all. Lesson two: peasants, oppressed for too long, always rebel. Lesson three: donât go to war in the Middle East without a good exit plan.
